title: Ray Swan — Creative Synthesist
description: Exploring the spaces where art, code, and story converge. A portfolio of work at the intersection of technology and human experience — blending software, design, and narrative to craft meaningful digital worlds.
about:
I began my career building educational software — crafting tools that made learning more accessible and engaging. But what started as utility evolved into passion: the realization that *technology itself could be a creative medium*. Over time, I embraced my role as a synthesist: weaving together the logic of development, the emotion of visual art, and the resonance of story into unified experiences.

This portfolio reflects that journey — a collection of work that bridges disciplines and challenges boundaries. Whether designing immersive web applications, writing speculative fiction, or experimenting with visual design systems, my focus remains the same: exploring the ways digital and human expression can meet, and creating work that feels alive.
